amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund for addressing minority health disparities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2780 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2780 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2657-2658; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2657) To establish a reserve fund for addressing minority health disparities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2780 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2780 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Clinton.
